biotools.summary: DeepTFactor is a deep learning-based tool that predicts whether a protein in question is a transcription factor. DeepTFactor uses a convolutional neural network to extract features of a protein. It showed high performance in predicting TFs of both eukaryotic and prokaryotic origins,

bioschemas.name: DeepTFactor
